overview: A graduate from the University of Rochester with a Bachelors degree in Liberal Arts, Jonathan has been working as a marketing professional for the past six years. Jon is best known as Jon4Lakers on YouTube where his technology reviews have garnered national and international attention. His channel (www.youtube.com/jon4lakers) currently has over 50,000 subscribers, his videos were viewed 3 million times in August, and he is currently the 69th most subscribed all time (Gurus). He has been featured in PCWorld magazine (December, 2008) and been a guest on MacBreak Weekly. Jonathan is also a member of the University of California, Irvineâ€™s Fully-Employed M.B.A. class of 2011.
